mapper.sql: SELECT t.*, m.MNT_TURRET_POSITION, m.MNT_GAUGE_Z, m.MNT_TOOL_OFFSET, m.MNT_Z_OFFSET, m.MNT_REACH, m.MNT_ROUGHING_TOOL, m.MNT_FINISHING_TOOL, m.MNT_COOLANT, m.MNT_TOOL_OFFSET FROM TS_TOOL t LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_MOUNTING m ON m.MNT_TOOL_ID = t.TL_TOOL_ID AND m.MNT_JOB_DESC = '<All Kit>'
mapper.update: UPDATE TS_MOUNTING SET MNT_TURRET_POSITION = #{turretPosition}, MNT_GAUGE_Z = #{gaugeZ}, MNT_Z_OFFSET = #{zoffset}, MNT_TOOL_OFFSET = #{offset}, MNT_REACH = #{reach}, MNT_ROUGHING_TOOL = #{roughingInt}, MNT_FINISHING_TOOL = #{finishingInt}, MNT_COOLANT = #{coolantInt} WHERE MNT_TOOL_ID = #{id} AND MNT_JOB_DESC = '<All Kit>'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TS_MOUNTING ( MNT_TOOL_ID, MNT_TURRET_POSITION, MNT_DESCRIPTION, MNT_JOB_DESC, MNT_COMMENT, MNT_LOADING_ANGLE, MNT_SPINDLE_DIR_ID, MNT_TOOL_OFFSET, MNT_MACHINING_MODE_ID, MNT_TOOL_LIFE, MNT_COLOUR, MNT_LAYER, MNT_LAST_MATERIAL, MNT_GAUGE_Z, MNT_Z_OFFSET, MNT_REACH, MNT_TURRET_ID, MNT_CREATED, MNT_ROUGHING_TOOL, MNT_FINISHING_TOOL, MNT_HOLDER_OFFSET_ORIGIN, MNT_COOLANT, MNT_COOLANT_TAPS ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{turretPosition}, #{description}, '<All Kit>', #{description}, 90, 0, #{offset}, 0, 100, 0, 0, 'Aluminium - Cast alloy (6 {37} Si)', #{gaugeZ}, #{zoffset}, #{reach}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{roughingInt}, #{finishingInt}, 0, #{coolantInt}, 7)
mapper.update: UPDATE TS_TOOL SET TL_INSERT_DESC = null, TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION = #{description}, TL_TOOL_CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryById}, TL_TOOL_TYPE_MILL_ID = #{millTypeById}, TL_TOOL_TYPE_HOLE_ID = #{holeTypeById}, TL_UNITS_ID = #{unitsById}, TL_TEETH = #{teeth}, TL_DIAMETER = #{diameter}, TL_CORNER_RADIUS = #{cornerRadius}, TL_FLUTE_LENGTH = #{fluteLength}, TL_THREAD = #{threadPitch}, TL_TIP_ANGLE = #{tipAngle}, TL_SHANK_LENGTH = #{shankLength}, TL_SHANK_WIDTH = #{shankWidth}, TL_USER1 = #{manufacturer}, TL_USER2 = #{itemId}, TL_USER3 = #{url}, TL_USER4 = #{comment} WHERE TL_TOOL_ID = #{id}

INSERT INTO TS_TOOL ( TL_INSERT_DESC, TL_TOOL_DESCRIPTION, TL_TOOL_CATEGORY_ID, TL_TOOL_TYPE_MILL_ID, TL_TOOL_TYPE_HOLE_ID, TL_UNITS_ID, TL_TEETH, TL_DIAMETER, TL_CORNER_RADIUS, TL_FLUTE_LENGTH, TL_THREAD, TL_TIP_ANGLE, TL_SHANK_LENGTH, TL_SHANK_WIDTH, TL_USER1, TL_USER2, TL_USER3, TL_USER4) VALUES ( null, #{description}, #{categoryById}, #{millTypeById}, #{holeTypeById}, #{unitsById}, #{teeth}, #{diameter}, #{cornerRadius}, #{fluteLength}, #{threadPitch}, #{tipAngle}, #{shankLength}, #{shankWidth}, #{manufacturer}, #{itemId}, #{url}, #{comment} )
